title: earthspirit_(arknights)
body:
[i]Earthspirit, Supporter Operator of Rhodes Island, will provide reliable support on the battlefield when she's on duty.[/i]

A playable Supporter Operator in [[Arknights]].

h4. Profile
[expand]
[table]
[tbody]
      [tr][td]Place of Birth:[/td]
      [td]Leithanien[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Birthday:[/td]
      [td]April 5[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Race:[/td]
      [td]Caprinae[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Height:[/td]
      [td]161 cm[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Combat Experience:[/td]
      [td]None[/td][/tr]
  [/tbody]
[/table]
[/expand]

A geologist from Leithanien. She is a specialist in fields such as environmental assessment, battlefield analysis, and terrain utilization. She currently serves with a support squad performing geological surveys, early Catastrophe warnings and other related services for Rhodes Island.

Her motif is based on mountain goats.

Her [[voice actor]] is [[Yuuki Aoi]].

h4. Skins

* !post #3827787: Default
* !post #3827789: [[earthspirit (elite II) (arknights)|Elite II]]
* !post #7095950: [[earthspirit (major field) (arknights)|Major Field]]

title: kisaragi_(kancolle)
body:
[[Kantai Collection]]'s personification of the Japanese destroyer [i]Kisaragi[/i]. Character design by [[Kusada Souta]], voiced by [[Hidaka Rina]].

She has [[long hair|long]] [[brown hair]] with a [[hair ribbon]], and [[purple eyes|purple]]/[[brown eyes]] which depend on the artist. She and her sister [[Mutsuki (Kancolle)|]] wear a white version of the class' uniform: a [[white shirt]] with [[green sailor collar]], [[green skirt|green]] [[pleated skirt]], [[black thighhighs]], and [[grey footwear|grey]] [[rudder footwear]]. 

Her [[rigging]] consists of her real-life funnel and foremast on her back, a 12 cm single [[handgun]] mount, and 61 cm triple [[torpedo tubes]] on [[thigh strap]]s.

In the third episode of the [[Kantai Collection (anime)|Kantai Collection anime]] she sinks, leading to a surge of fanart shortly after that episode. See pool #9670. This is reflective of the real-life [i]Kisaragi[/i] being sunk in the battle of Wake Island in December 1941.

h4. Appearance

title: murakumo_(kancolle)
body: [[Kantai Collection]]'s personification of the Japanese destroyer [i]Murakumo[/i]. Character design by [[Ayaki]], voiced by [[Uesaka Sumire]]. She has [[long hair|long]] [[white hair]] with [[tress ribbon|red tress ribbons]] on her [[sidelocks]], [[orange eyes]], and [[small breasts]]. Unlike the rest of the [i]Fubuki[/i]-class, she wears a short one-piece [[white dress|white]] [[sailor dress]], [[red necktie]], [[black pantyhose|black]] [[thighband pantyhose]], [[loafers]] that double as [[rudder footwear]], and floating [[headgear]] over the sides of her head. Her [[rigging]] consists of her real-life bridge as a backpack, two 12.7 cm twin gun mounts attached to it, and 61 cm triple [[torpedo tubes]] mounted to her left wrist. She uses a [[spear]] as a melee weapon. She has a [[tsundere]] personality but is more open and less spiteful from the get-go than [[Akebono (kancolle)|]] and [[Kasumi (kancolle)|]]. h4. Appearance * !post #2093158: Base and kai * !post #1978931: [[Murakumo Kai Ni (Kancolle)|Kai Ni]] * !post #1920626: [[Murakumo (valentine) (kancolle)|Valentine]] h4. Related characters h6. title: isonami_(kancolle)
body: [[Kantai Collection]]'s personification of the Japanese destroyer [i]Isonami[/i]. Character design by [[Shibafu (glock23)|]], voiced by [[Uesaka Sumire]]. She has [[long hair|long]] [[black hair]] in a pair of [[braid|braids]] plus [[sidelocks]], and [[black eyes]]. Her default outfit is the Special-Type's serafuku: a [[white shirt]] with [[blue sailor collar]], blue [[neckerchief]], [[blue_skirt|blue]] [[pleated skirt]], [[black socks]], and [[grey footwear|grey]] [[rudder footwear]]. Her [[rigging]] is shared with the other Special-Types: her funnel to her back with a 12.7 cm twin gun mount and 61 cm triple [[torpedo tubes]] on her thighs. She has a [[shy]], [[nervous]], and "girly" personality, which makes for an odd pairing with her "younger sister" [[Uranami (Kancolle)|]], who is reliant upon Isonami despite Isonami being generally far less sure of herself than the rather enthusiastic Uranami. h4. Appearance * !post #3296658: Base and kai * !post #5348438: [[Isonami Kai Ni (Kancolle)|Kai Ni]] * !post #2852929: [[isonami (photographer) (kancolle)|Photographer]] * !post #3483291: [[isonami (train conductor) (kancolle)|Train Conductor]] h4. title: kamikaze_pilot
body:
[b]Kamikaze[/b] (神風, lit. "divine wind" or "spirit wind") [[pilot]]s, officially known as the [b]Shinpuu Tokubetsu Kougekitai[/b] (神風特別攻撃隊, "Divine Wind Special Attack Unit"), were a part of the Japanese Special Attack Units of [[Imperial Japanese Navy]] [[military]] aviators who flew suicide attacks for the Empire of Japan against Allied naval vessels in the closing stages of the Pacific campaign of [[World War II]]. 

They were first deployed during the [[Battle of Leyte Gulf]]. Their main purpose was to destroy warships more effectively than with conventional air attacks by crashing their explosive filled aircraft directly into the enemy ships. About 3,800 kamikaze pilots died during the war, and more than 7,000 U.S. naval personnel were killed by kamikaze attacks.

h4.See also

* [[Kaiten (weapon)|]]
* [[MXY-7 Ohka]]
* [[The Cockpit: Sonic Boom Squadron]]

title: ooshio_(kancolle)
body:
[[Kantai Collection]]'s personification of the Japanese destroyer [i]Ooshio[/i]. Character design by [[Konishi (koconatu)|]], voiced by [[Miyakawa Wakana]].

She has [[blue_hair|blue]]/[[purple_hair|purple]] hair in [[short twintails]], and [[purple eyes]]. Her default outfit is the Konishi-design [i]Asashio[/i]-class uniform: a [[short_sleeves|short-sleeved]] [[white shirt]], a [[grey skirt]] with [[suspenders]], [[black socks|black]] [[kneehighs]], and grey-red [[rudder footwear]]. 

Her [[rigging]] consists of her real-life bridge and foremast to her back, a 12.7 cm twin [[handgun]] mount, and 61 cm quad handheld [[torpedo tubes]]. 

She is a cheerful, high-spirited girl. Her catchphrase is "Big Torpedo In A Small Body!", which is sometimes jokingly referred to as a [[sexually suggestive]] phrase.

h4. Appearance

title: secret_level_(series)
body:
Secret Level is a 2024 animated anthology series created by Tim Miller for Amazon Prime. Produced by Blur Studio and Amazon MGM Studios, the series feature stand-along stories based on popular video games, both old and new including upcoming new games. The series is notable for having an A-List celebrity voice cast which includes [[Arnold Schwarzenegger]] and [[Keanu Reeves]] and one episode was based on the video game [[Concord (game)|]], which was already cancelled by the time the episode was released. The 1st season aired on December 2024, with a 2nd season in the works.

h4. Games featured in Secret Level

[b]Season 1[/b]

* [[Dungeons & Dragons]]
* [[Sifu (game)|]]
* New World
* [[Unreal Tournament]]
* [[Warhammer 40k: Space Marine]]
* [[Pac-man (game)|]]
* [[Crossfire]]
* [[Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon]]
* [[The Outer Worlds]]
* [[Mega Man (series)|]]
* Exodus
* [[Spelunky]]
* [[Concord (game)|]]
* [[wangzhe rongyao|Honor of Kings]]
* [[Playstation]] (Based on several Sony published videogames including [[Helldivers (series)|]], [[God of War]] and [[Little Big Planet]])

title: star_wars:_the_force_awakens
body:
An epic [[science fiction]] and [[fantasy]] film from 2015. It is part of the [[Star Wars]] franchise now owned by [[Disney]].

[i][b]Star Wars: The Force Awakens[/b][/i] (also known as [i][b]Episode VII[/b][/i]) is the first of a new "sequel trilogy" of films that begin chronologically 30 years after the events of  [[Star Wars: return of The Jedi|Return of the Jedi]].

The new film introduced several new characters and locations alongside returning characters.

title: shampoo_no_nioi_ga_shita
body:
Shampoo no Nioi ga Shita is the second single by [[22/7]], as well as the [[costume]] associated with it.

The costume is designed as a [[school uniform]]. It includes a [[white shirt|white]] [[collared shirt|collared]] [[long sleeves|long-sleeved]] shirt, a [[blue dress|blue]] [[plaid dress|plaid]] [[pinafore dress]], a [[double-breasted]] [[blue jacket]], a [[black bowtie]], [[black socks|black]] [[kneehighs]] (or [[black pantyhose]]), and [[black shoes|black]] [[loafers]]. An [[emblem]] of 22/7 is sewn onto the left shoulder of jacket. Although the dress comes with a [[plaid belt]], it is usually hidden under the jacket.

h4. Examples
* !post #4844190: [[album cover]]
* !post #7999533: The dress with the belt under the jacket

title: alfonsino_(fish)
body:
A deep-sea fish belonging to the family Berycidae (order Beryciformes), known for its striking red coloration and adaptations to life in the ocean's depths.

Appearance:
* Bright red or orange-red body, silvery-pink underside, and red fins/mouth lining. This coloration acts as camouflage in deep waters where red light is absorbed.
* Large eyes with a reflective layer (tapetum lucidum) to enhance vision in low-light environments.
* Deep, laterally compressed body, forked caudal fin, and elongated pelvic/dorsal fins.

title: ishar-mla_(arknights)
body:
The sea dragon-like Leviathan named Ishar'mla, titled the "Corrupting Heart," is one of the four "Firstborn" of the Seaborn representing the power of "Migration." For millenia, He was sleeping deep within the "Mantle Ruins", an abandoned First Civilization underwater complex that Aegirians believe it was the birthplace of their civilization. It wouldn't be until 200 years ago when Maritimus, the famous anthropologist who was heading Aegir´s Fourth Mantle Ruins Expedition, made contact with Ishar'mla while exploring the ruins, awakening which led to him to be plagued by strange visions about the ancient civilization's downfall, and Ishar'mla devoring anything at His pass. He would later become a Seaborn after eating one of Ishar'mla's cubs not long after.

Ishar'mla was thought to be slain by the Abyssal Hunters during the great assault against the Leviathans as they were hiding within the ancient ruins of the abyss. However, it turns out that Ishar'mla's blood has merged with Skadi after the devastating battle and remained dormant for years. Due to its divine nature and His aggressiveness, the Sea Terrors tremble before Ishar'mla and the higher Seaborn refer to Him as their close kin.

title: arachnophobia
body: An intense and often irrational fear of [[spider]]s and other arachnids (such as [[scorpion]]s, mites, and [[tick]]s). It is one of the most common specific phobias, affecting many people worldwide. While it’s normal for some individuals to be cautious or uneasy around spiders, arachnophobia goes beyond mild discomfort—it can cause severe anxiety, distress, and sometimes panic attacks.

title: oripathy_lesion_(arknights)
body:
A specific character design feature of [[Arknights]]. In the backstory, characters infected with "Oripathy" from exposure to the mineral [[originium (arknights)|]] eventually have originium begin to fuse with their cells; this creates "oripathy lesions" both internally and externally. These appear as black [tn](except for [[Angelina (arknights)|Angelina]] and [[ceobe (arknights)|Ceobe]] — they have blue and yellow, respectively)[/tn] originium "chips" on the body and are present in a number of the character designs for characters in the game. It is not present on all characters, however, since not every operator or character is necessarily infected (or does not yet have external lesions).

It is also a feature that many fan artists, particularly ones who are not very familiar with the property, often miss. Characters that should have oripathy lesions are often missing them in fan art and even the official art can be a little inconsistent about it ("Ifrit's Elite II":/posts/3563831 art is an infamous example).

h4. Examples
* !post #6616977: On leg
* !post #5837758: On chest
* !post #6362876: On shoulder

h4. See also

* [[infection monitor (Arknights)]]

title: spiffo_(project_zomboid)
body:

Originally a playable character in [i]PAWS[/i], a canceled fighting game by [i]Project Zomboid[/i] developer The Indie Stone, he now serves as the [[mascot]] for Spiffo's, an in-game fast food chain, as well as for the developers themselves.

title: gunfighter_ballads_and_trail_songs
body: A 1959 country album by Marty Robbins. [i]Gunfighter Ballads[/i] contains Robbins's best-known song, "El Paso", as well as [[big iron|"Big Iron"]], which became notorious online after it appeared in [i][[Fallout: New Vegas]][/i] in 2010.

title: big_iron
body:
A country ballad by Marty Robbins, from his 1959 album [i][[Gunfighter Ballads and Trail Songs]][/i]. "Big Iron" tells the story of an unnamed Arizona Ranger who rides into the town of Agua Fria sometime between 1901 and 1909 (the years of the original Ranger organization's existence). Unnerved by his silence and the large handgun he carries (the eponymous "big iron"), the townsfolk initially take the Ranger for an outlaw, until he explains that he is hunting a notorious outlaw called Texas Red.

Long overshadowed in Robbins's canon by "El Paso" from the same album, "Big Iron" entered 21st-century meme culture through its appearance on the soundtrack of [i][[Fallout: New Vegas]][/i] in 2010.

body:
[b]Attribute[/b]: Light

[b]Effect[/b]: When a card or effect is activated that targets this card (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon 1 "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" from your hand, Deck, or GY. When this card is targeted for an attack: You can negate the attack, and if you do, change the battle position of this card, then you can Special Summon 1 "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" from your hand, Deck, or GY. You can only use 1 "Maiden with Eyes of Blue" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

title: shinsha_(tensura)
body:
Character appearing in the mobile game "That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Isekai Memories." 

She's considered the daughter of [[Rimuru Tempest]]. [spoiler]And she's born from the wish of [[Shuna (tensura)|Shuna]] to have a child with Rimuru.[/spoiler]

She has multiple forms. The first is her slime form, unlike Rimuru she is pink. Her second form is her human form, which is very similar to Rimuru's appearance, but her eyes are red. [spoiler]And the last form is her evolved form, now with pink hair.

title: odette_mori
body:
[[Virtual YouTuber]] from [[NEXAS (vtuber)|]]' first generation. Character design by [[3pel1]]. Also shares the same character designer with [[Nyantsume]] from the same generation, along with [[Yuri Yaneva]].

On January 24, 2025, Odette announced that she would be graduating on the same day that NEXAS shuts down after initially saying that she would keep her IP, which is on the 31st of the same month, and would be rebranding.

She has [[long hair|long]] [[white hair]] [[hair between eyes|between her eyes]], [[owl ears]], a [[grey hat]] and [[pink eyes]].

Her outfit consists of a [[white shirt|white]] [[collared shirt]], a [[white capelet]], a [[grey coat]], a [[fur-trimmed skirt|fur-trimmed]] [[pink skirt]], [[black gloves]], a [[black bag]] with multiple [[envelope|envelopes]], [[white pantyhose]] and [[black boots|black]] [[fur-trimmed boots]] with [[pom pom (clothes)|pom poms]].

title: tangaroa_(housamo)
body:
The Great Creator, Tangaroa, created an island world out of his own body, drawing from his own flesh and blood to bring life to its soil, foliage, and even the surrounding sky. Slightly overprotective, he longs for the happiness of all living creatures on his island, guiding them as a father and welcoming even visitors as his own children. Though the creation of his island used up most of his original flesh, he retains form as a Staff, a Sacred Artifact comprised of his few remaining bones. Only a chosen warrior of the island tribe may possess the Staff, which imbues its wielder with Tangaroa's memories, designating the wielder an incarnation of the Great Creator, and thus, leader of the tribe.

h4.See also

* [[Tokyo Afterschool Summoners]]

h4. External links

* "Tokyo Afterschool Summoners Wiki: Tangaroa":https://housamo.wiki/Tangaroa

title: arsalan_(housamo)
body:
[[Tokyo Afterschool Summoners]] character.

He is the Lion Therian labelled Guardian of the Aoyama Guild and Defender of Justice. Many of his guild members depend on him. Tokyo was not the first place he was summoned to so he is knowledgeable about the cultures and customs of many other worlds, and he used to be a king, meaning that his leadership skills are exceptional. His emerald bejeweled Decorative Sword Sacred Artifact secrets holy oil. He rubs it all over his body to engage in Turkish oil wrestling. This Sacred Artifact was once possessed of an ancient monarch and anointing one's body with its oil is a symbol of the divine right to rule."

Designed by [[kira nerisu]].

h4. External links

title: ritual_baton
body:
A long and flat scepter, often made from bamboo. It originates from ancient China, where it originally served as an object to write on. It is strongly associated with ancient noblemen, [[shinto]] priests, and [[hina ningyou]].

Known as [i]shaku[/i] in Japanese and [i]hu[/i] in Chinese. 

[[enma_(mythology)|Enma]]'s [[rod of remorse]] is a variant of this ritual baton.

h4. Examples

* !post #5056000

* !post #1000541

* [[Paddle]]
* [[Tate eboshi]]

title: qubeley_mk_ii
body:
A fictional [[mecha]] from the [[Gundam]] franchise. It first appeared in the [[Gundam ZZ]] series from 1986.

[b]AMX-004-2/3 Qubeley Mk-II[/b]

An improved version of the [[Qubeley]] [[mobile suit]] deployed by [[Neo Zeon]]. The two units produced featured minute improvements over the original, notably two extra funnels, for a total of 12 remote weapons, and a three-pronged beam saber. The first unit produced was a purplish blue with black and pink vents, intended to be piloted by [[Elpeo Puru]]. The second was orange or red with yellow vents, and was piloted by [[Puru Two]].

h4.See also
* [[Qubeley Mass Production Type]]

title: qubeley_mass_production_type
body:
A fictional [[mecha]] from the [[Gundam]] franchise. It first appeared in the [[Gundam ZZ]] series from 1986.

[b]AMX-004G Qubeley Mass Production Type[/b]

A late mass produced variant of the [[Qubeley Mk II]] [[mobile suit]], with greatly increased funnel carrying capacity and two large back beam cannons, but reduced speed and maneuverability as a result of the added weight. 

The units were mostly piloted by the remainder of the clones of [[Elpeo Puru]], with the exception of [[Puru Two]].

title: ecce_homo
body:
An early 20th-century fresco of [[Jesus]] by Elías García Martínez in Borja, Zaragoza, Spain

 In August 2012 news broke about a restoration attempt by Cecilia Giménez, a woman in her 80s. BBC correspondent Christian Fraser said, "the once-dignified portrait now resembles a crayon sketch of a very hairy monkey in an ill-fitting tunic". It has now jokingly been dubbed "Ecce Mono", or "Behold the Monkey". Others have referred to it as "[[potato jesus (meme)|Potato Jesus]]".

More generally, [i]Ecce Homo[/i] is Latin for "Behold the Man", a phrase spoken by Pontius Pilate at the trial of Christ.  There are also various art works with this title other than Martínez's.

h4. External links

* [1] http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-europe-19349921
* "Wikipedia: Ecce Homo (disambiguation)":http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ecce_Homo_%28disambiguation%29
* "Wikipedia: Ecce Homo (Elías García Martínez)":http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ecce_Homo_%28El%C3%ADas_Garc%C3%ADa_Mart%C3%ADnez%29

title: operation_ten-gou
body:
[b]Operation Ten-Go[/b] was the last major Japanese naval offensive in [[World War II]] that took place on 7 April 1945. The operation occurred during the [[Battle of Okinawa]] and was a last desperate attempt by the [[Imperial Japanese Navy]] to slow down the advancement of the Allied forces into [[Japan]], which ended in a defeat as the Americans' air superiority dominated the battle, leading to the sinking of the Japanese battleship [[Yamato_(battleship)|]] as well as other ships while the American aircraft that attacked them only suffered minuscule losses.

h4. Participants 

h5. IJN

* [[Yamato (Kancolle)|]] (flagship) (sunk)
* [[Yahagi (Kancolle)|]] (destroyer squadron escort leader) (sunk)
* [[Hatsushimo (Kancolle)|Hatsu]][[Hatsushimo (Azur Lane)|shimo]]
* [[Kasumi (Kancolle)|Kasu]][[Kasumi (Azur Lane)|mi]] (sunk)
* [[Yukikaze (Kancolle)|Yuki]][[Yukikaze (Azur Lane)|kaze]]

title: akagi_(kancolle)
body:
[[Kantai Collection]]'s personification of the Japanese aircraft carrier [i]Akagi[/i]. Character design by [[Shibafu_(glock23)|]], voiced by [[Fujita Saki]]. 

She has [[long hair|long,]] [[straight hair|straight]] [[brown hair]] and [[brown eyes]]. She is typically seen wearing a [[muneate]] over white and red [[japanese clothes]] in a [[nontraditional miko]] style with a red [[tasuki]]. She also wears an apron based on the stern end of her flight deck, with the kana "ア" inscribed on it. She wears white [[thighhighs]].

Her [[rigging]] includes notably less armor or machinery than most shipgirls. She holds a traditional [[Kyuudou]] [[bow_(weapon)|bow]] and has [[arrow (projectile)|]]s in a [[quiver]] slung over her shoulder by a strap which also has a replica of her ship's [[mast]]. On her right arm, she has her flight deck worn like a shield. She wears [[geta]]-like sandals that have carrier-like decks on them.

She is nicknamed the "Bauxite Queen" and portrayed as a [[glutton]]ous eater thanks to her reputation for eating up all the Bauxite reserves in your inventory.

h4. Appearance

title: akishimo_(kancolle)
body:
[[Kantai Collection]]'s personification of the Japanese destroyer [i]Akishimo[/i]. Character designed by [[Fujikawa]], voiced by [[Toyoguchi Megumi]].

She is portrayed with [[short hair|short]] [[grey hair|grey]] [[asymmetrical hair]] [[short hair with long locks|with a long left lock]] that [[gradient hair|gradiates]] to [[brown_hair|brown]]. On either side of her head, she wears a [[leaf hair ornament]] over her ear.

Her default outfit is the [i]Yuugumo[/i]-class [[school uniform]] with a [[long sleeves|long sleeved]] [[white shirt]] under a [[purple dress|purple]] [[pleated dress]] and a [[blue bowtie]] around her neck. Like [[Hayanami (kancolle)|]] before her, she wears [[grey thighhighs|grey]] or [[purple thighhighs|purple]] [[side-seamed legwear|seamed]] [[thighhighs]] instead of a pantyhose in her base form. Her damaged CG reveals she wears [[orange panties|orange]] underwear underneath her uniform. Her [[rigging]] is the same as the rest of the class: her funnel and foremast to her back, a 12.7 cm twin [[handgun]] mount, and two 61 cm quad [[torpedo tubes]] on [[thigh strap]]s. 

h4. Skins

* !post #3709147: Base
* !post #7042769: [[Akishimo (new year) (kancolle)|Haregi Mode/New Year]]
* !post #3775515: Valentine Mode

h4. History
The historical destroyer was sunk during a US Navy carrier strike on Manila alongside [[Akebono (kancolle)|]] on November 14, 1944. Hatsuharu, Satsuki, Okinami, Kiso, and Nachi were also sunk in the same area. 

h4. [i]Yuugumo[/i]-class destroyers

It later made its on-screen debut in [[Ultra Galaxy Mega Dai-Kaijuu Battle|Ultra Galaxy Mega Dai-Kaijuu Battle: NEVER ENDING ODYSSEY]].

title: uchiwa
body:
Originally from China, the uchiwa is a round or oval [[hand fan]] made of paper or silk pasted over a framework of thin bamboo strips.

With [[hand fan writing|a message written on it]], it is sometimes used in [[oshi-katsu]] as a lightweight placard.

Not to be confused with [[tuanshan]], another type of round hand fan.

h4. See also

* [[folding fan]]
* [[paper fan]]
* [[uchiwa (medium)]]

title: gene_(god_hand)
body:
The main protagonist of [[God Hand]].

[b]Gene[/b] is a young man wearing a tight [[white shirt]] and [[black coat]] with the left sleeve ripped at the forearm and the right ripped off completely, with shin-length [[coattails]] and [[black pants]]. He has an [[Handkerchief|orange handkerchief]] tied around his collar. Gene also wears a silver belt buckle and long black [[boots]], and dons a set of braces on his tattooed right arm (his Godhand) adorned with skull shapes referred to as the "Deistic Brace", and a [[fingerless gloves|Fingerless glove]] on his left hand. His build is top-heavy and [[muscular_male|muscular]], and his hair is [[blonde hair|light brown]] and slicked back. His left cheek has a white square [[bandaid]], and his eyes appear to be [[brown eyes|brown]].

His Voice actor is: [[Beng spies]]

H4. Appearance 
* !asset #24824147: In-Game Appearance
* !post #7532462: Official Concept art, Depicted having [[silver hair]]

H4. See also
* [[Olivia (god hand)|Olivia]]

H4. External Links
* [God Hand Capcom Fandom Wiki: Gene](https://godhandcapcom.fandom.com/wiki/Gene)
